resources.string: A condition is an umbrella problem that may include many symptoms. For example, Crohn’s Disease or fibromyalgia.
Symptoms are the specific physical or mental problems that you want to treat. For example, chest pain or fatigue.
List all treatments you are currently using, each day we will ask which you took, and let you enter dosages.
Treatments can be anything you use to improve your symptoms. For example: prednisone or a dairy-free diet.
Which treatments did you take today?
You weren\'t tracking any symptoms on this day.
You didn\'t check in on this day
You weren\'t tracking any treatments on this day.
You weren\'t tracking any conditions on this day.
How active were your conditions on this day?
How active were your symptoms on this day?
Are you sure you want to remove the treatment "{{treatment}}" for this Checkin?
Don\’t forget to check into Flaredown today!
How active were your conditions today?
Not required, and you can change these later

request is larger than the server is willing or able to process

server does not support media type

server cannot meet requirements of Expect request-header field
No future dates are allowed. Time travel backwards is alright.

Something went wrong, perhaps try again

request failed due to failure of a previous request

server received an invalid response from upstream server
client should switch to a different protocol
You can only check in up to two weeks in the past
gateway did not receive response from upstream server
Either the email or password you submitted was incorrect.
origin server requires the request to be conditional
server does not support the HTTP protocol version
user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time
content negotiation for the request results in a circular reference
server is unable to store the representation
server detected an infinite loop while processing the request
